name: Lamberto Leoni
introduction: Lamberto Leoni (born 24 May 1953) is a former Italian racing driver. Although most of his success came in Formula 2 and Formula 3000, he also participated in five Formula One Grand Prix between 1977 and 1978 with Surtees and Ensign. His only Formula One race start was at the 1978 Argentine Grand Prix, where he retired with a mechanical failure.
